name: Enhanced Syndicate Names
description: Expands and improves (subjectively) the list of available syndicate names by moving some around, and restoring unused names!

options.name: Dark Psykonaut
options.tooltip: Changes 'Dark Psychonaut' to the early/unused spelling 'Dark Psykonaut' because it looks cooler.

options.name: The Disruptor
options.tooltip: Fixes an IO typo, changing 'The Disrupter' to 'The Disruptor'. Has nothing to do with the Elusive Target, and predates him by at least a year.
